# Graveyard (Building)
## Overview
**Graveyard**

**Create** 18 Goods, 12 Influence, 19 Labor, 5 Magic (1,600 gp)

**Rooms** 3 [[Burial Ground (Room)|Burial Grounds]], 1 [[Crypt (Room)|Crypt]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]]

A plot of land where the dead are buried and honored.
